title: Jardin's Gamble
description: Jardin had once had it all. A submissive to love, cherish and dominate. His best friend to share her with.Until he lost it all.Then he hires a sassy, take-no-prisoners assistant with a surprisingly sweet, submissive side.Could she be his second shot at happiness?Bitter and angry, Carrick bailed on his previous life, with no intention of ever looking back. He didn't want or need anyone.Until the day he stopped to help a spitfire change her tire. And his world shifted on its axis.Can two men put behind the pain of the past in order to find a future with the woman they both love?Please note this book is mmf and contains spanking and sexy times. Please do not purchase if this offends.
author: Laylah Roberts
